name: Joe Moura
bio: /summary:** results-driven engineering leader with close to 20 years of experience in the software industry. founder of crewai, focusing on ai agents and multi-agent frameworks. previous experience includes roles at clearbit and hubspot. open source enthusiast and public speaker. Notable achievements: ** founder of crewai, a company focused on ai agents, with previous experience at clearbit and hubspot. public speaker and open source enthusiast.
industry: ** Software Engineering, Ai And Data Science
